dt: {bc}the rate of change of the angle through which the tangent to a {a_link|curve} turns in moving along the curve and which for a circle is equal to the reciprocal of the radius

shortdef: the act of curving : the state of being curved

a measure or amount of curving; specifically : the rate of change of the angle through which the tangent to a curve turns in moving along the curve and which for a circle is equal to the reciprocal of the radius
an abnormal curving (as of the spine)
